definition: to teach by example
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
religion/teaching/to make/to cause/to tell
surname Jiao
to teach
to teach by words and example (idiom)
Explaining in words is not as good as teaching by example (idiom). Action speaks louder than words.
pinyin: yan2 jiao4 bu4 ru2 shen1 jiao4

definition: teaching by example beats explaining in words (idiom)/action speaks louder than words
pinyin: shen1 jiao4 sheng4 yu2 yan2 jiao4

sentences.english: They bring home to me the true meaning of "Example is better than precept".
sentences.chinese: 他們使我明白身教重於言教的真義。

sentences.english: The best way to grow is life long education.
sentences.chinese: 成長最好的方法就是終身教育。

sentences.english: The technical education is a part of the lifetime education.
sentences.chinese: 職業教育是終身教育的內在組成部分。

sentences.english: The phenomenon is described as "acting as an example to others" and "equality of human rights".
sentences.chinese: 他們把這種現象解釋爲“言傳身教”和“人權平等。”

sentences.english: Community education is part of life-long education.
sentences.chinese: 社區教育是終身教育的一部分。

sentences.english: The old workers instruct the young workers not only in words but in deeds.
sentences.chinese: 老工人對青年工人不僅言傳而且身教。

sentences.english: We all know that "example is better than precept."
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道，“身教重於言教”。

sentences.english: Teach them good manners and behavior through your actions as much as your words.
sentences.chinese: 孩子良好的習慣與行爲規範，要通過言傳身教來養成。

sentences.english: Quest for lifelong education is of primary importance.
sentences.chinese: 追尋終身教育是相當重要的。

sentences.english: Self-study examination of higher education is greatly promoting the development of life-long education.
sentences.chinese: 高等教育自學考試大大推動了終身教育的發展。

sentences.english: Confucius was knowledge and he always taught his students by his words and behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 孔子很博學，而他總是通過言傳身教教育他的學生們。

sentences.english: You taught by example and for that I am grateful.
sentences.chinese: 你以身作則，身教重於言教，對此我非常感激。

sentences.english: Compared to traditional educational mode, life-long education protrudes different features.
sentences.chinese: 終身教育凸顯了與傳統教育不同的特徵。

sentences.english: Yet one of the finest lessons he left behind was his humility.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他留給我們的最佳身教，就是他的謙卑。

sentences.english: The son HAD well profited by the precept and example of the father.
sentences.chinese: 老太爺的言傳身教早已使他兒子獲益無窮。

sentences.english: Quest for lifelong education is primary importance .
sentences.chinese: 尋求終身教育至關重要。

definition: to give verbal instruction
to teach by words and example (idiom)
teaching by example beats explaining in words (idiom)/action speaks louder than words
pinyin: shen1 jiao4 sheng4 yu2 yan2 jiao4

definition: to convey in words
Explaining in words is not as good as teaching by example (idiom). Action speaks louder than words.
pinyin: yan2 jiao4 bu4 ru2 shen1 jiao4

definition: to set an example (idiom); to serve as a model
to instruct/to teach/guidance/teaching
to practice what one preaches (idiom)
to educate people (esp. morally)
family education/upbringing/to bring sb up/private tutor
to educate one's children/godson
to enlighten/to civilize/to indoctrinate/to train (an animal)
to instruct
filial piety (Confucian virtue)/to be a good son or daughter
filial piety and fraternal duty
of all virtues filial piety is most important (idiom)
